ValidationRule.description: In order for contract complete the agency sales rep must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND ( RecordType.Id = "0120g000000l3qD", NOT (ISBLANK ( NEPs_Complete__c )), ISBLANK (Agency_Sales_Rep__c ) ), AND ( RecordType.Id = "012700000001jeX", ISPICKVAL(Onboarding_Process__c,'Agency Integrated Online Enrollment'), NOT (ISBLANK ( NEPs_Complete__c )), ISBLANK (Agency_Sales_Rep__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to have a value in the Agency Sales Rep Field
